short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Saving common prompts to use on chatGPT or other applications

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension lets you save prompts you write for chatGPT or other applications. It uses chrome sync storage which means you'll have your prompts available in whichever chrome session you open. 

It also lets you easily save and insert your prompts to ChatGPT's text area just by using the right-click contextual menus. 

If you select a text and right-click you can add that text to your commonly used prompts and edit it by using the extension's popup. 

If you right-click the text area of ChatGPT youÂ¡ll see your prompts ready to use.
